verses.verse: And of the blue <S%H8504><s%>, and purple <S%H713><s%>, and scarlet <S%H8144><s%> <S%H8438><s%>, they made <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8804><s%> cloths <S%H899><s%> of service <S%H8278><s%>, to do service <S%H8334><s%> <S%H8763><s%> in the holy <S%H6944><s%> place, and made <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the holy <S%H6944><s%> garments <S%H899><s%> for Aharon <S%H175><s%>; as the YY <S%H3068><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> <S%H8765><s%> Mosheh <S%H4872><s%>.

And he made <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the ephod <S%H646><s%> of gold <S%H2091><s%>, blue <S%H8504><s%>, and purple <S%H713><s%>, and scarlet <S%H8438><s%> <S%H8144><s%>, and fine twined <S%H7806><s%> <S%H8716><s%> linen <S%H8336><s%>.

And they did beat <S%H7554><s%> <S%H8762><s%> the gold <S%H2091><s%> into <S%H854><s%> thin plates <S%H6341><s%>, and cut <S%H7112><s%> <S%H8765><s%> it into wires <S%H6616><s%>, to work <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8800><s%> <S%H8432><s%> it in the blue <S%H8504><s%>, and in the purple <S%H713><s%>, and in the scarlet <S%H8144><s%> <S%H8438><s%>, and in the fine linen <S%H8336><s%>, with cunning <S%H2803><s%> <S%H8802><s%> work <S%H4639><s%>.

They made <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8804><s%> shoulderpieces <S%H3802><s%> for it, to couple it together <S%H2266><s%> <S%H8802><s%>: by the two <S%H8147><s%> edges <S%H7098><s%> <S%H8675><s%> <S%H7099><s%> was it coupled together <S%H2266><s%> <S%H8795><s%>.

And the curious girdle <S%H2805><s%> of his ephod <S%H642><s%>, that was upon it, was of the same, according to the work <S%H4639><s%> thereof; of gold <S%H2091><s%>, blue <S%H8504><s%>, and purple <S%H713><s%>, and scarlet <S%H8144><s%> <S%H8438><s%>, and fine twined <S%H7806><s%> <S%H8716><s%> linen <S%H8336><s%>; as the YY <S%H3068><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> <S%H8765><s%> Mosheh <S%H4872><s%>.

And they wrought <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8799><s%> onyx <S%H7718><s%> stones <S%H68><s%> inclosed <S%H4142><s%> <S%H8716><s%> in ouches <S%H4865><s%> of gold <S%H2091><s%>, graven <S%H6605><s%> <S%H8794><s%>, as signets <S%H2368><s%> are graven <S%H6603><s%>, with the names <S%H8034><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>.

And he put <S%H7760><s%> <S%H8799><s%> them on the shoulders <S%H3802><s%> of the ephod <S%H646><s%>, that they should be stones <S%H68><s%> for a memorial <S%H2146><s%> to the children <S%H1121><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>; as the YY <S%H3068><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> <S%H8765><s%> Mosheh <S%H4872><s%>.

And he made <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the breastplate <S%H2833><s%> of cunning <S%H2803><s%> <S%H8802><s%> work <S%H4639><s%>, like the work <S%H4639><s%> of the ephod <S%H646><s%>; of gold <S%H2091><s%>, blue <S%H8504><s%>, and purple <S%H713><s%>, and scarlet <S%H8144><s%> <S%H8438><s%>, and fine twined <S%H7806><s%> <S%H8716><s%> linen <S%H8336><s%>.

It was foursquare <S%H7251><s%> <S%H8803><s%>; they made <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8804><s%> the breastplate <S%H2833><s%> double <S%H3717><s%> <S%H8803><s%>: a span <S%H2239><s%> was the length <S%H753><s%> thereof, and a span <S%H2239><s%> the breadth <S%H7341><s%> thereof, being doubled <S%H3717><s%> <S%H8803><s%>.

And they set <S%H4390><s%> <S%H8762><s%> in it four <S%H702><s%> rows <S%H2905><s%> of stones <S%H68><s%>: the first row <S%H2905><s%> was a sardius <S%H124><s%>, a topaz <S%H6357><s%>, and a carbuncle <S%H1304><s%>: this was the first <S%H259><s%> row <S%H2905><s%>.
And the second <S%H8145><s%> row <S%H2905><s%>, an emerald <S%H5306><s%>, a sapphire <S%H5601><s%>, and a diamond <S%H3095><s%>.
And the third <S%H7992><s%> row <S%H2905><s%>, a ligure <S%H3958><s%>, an agate <S%H7618><s%>, and an amethyst <S%H306><s%>.

And the fourth <S%H7243><s%> row <S%H2905><s%>, a beryl <S%H8658><s%>, an onyx <S%H7718><s%>, and a jasper <S%H3471><s%>: they were inclosed <S%H4142><s%> <S%H8716><s%> in ouches <S%H4865><s%> of gold <S%H2091><s%> in their inclosings <S%H4396><s%>.

And the stones <S%H68><s%> were according to the names <S%H8034><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>, twelve <S%H8147><s%> <S%H6240><s%>, according to their names <S%H8034><s%>, like the engravings <S%H6603><s%> of a signet <S%H2368><s%>, every one <S%H376><s%> with his name <S%H8034><s%>, according to the twelve <S%H8147><s%> <S%H6240><s%> tribes <S%H7626><s%>.

And they made <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8799><s%> upon the breastplate <S%H2833><s%> chains <S%H8333><s%> at the ends <S%H1383><s%>, of wreathen <S%H5688><s%> work <S%H4639><s%> of pure <S%H2889><s%> gold <S%H2091><s%>.

And they made <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8799><s%> two <S%H8147><s%> ouches <S%H4865><s%> of gold <S%H2091><s%>, and two <S%H8147><s%> gold <S%H2091><s%> rings <S%H2885><s%>; and put <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the two <S%H8147><s%> rings <S%H2885><s%> in the two <S%H8147><s%> ends <S%H7098><s%> of the breastplate <S%H2833><s%>.

And they put <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the two <S%H8147><s%> wreathen chains <S%H5688><s%> of gold <S%H2091><s%> in the two <S%H8147><s%> rings <S%H2885><s%> on the ends <S%H7098><s%> of the breastplate <S%H2833><s%>.

And the two <S%H8147><s%> ends <S%H7098><s%> of the two <S%H8147><s%> wreathen <S%H5688><s%> chains <S%H5688><s%> they fastened <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8804><s%> in the two <S%H8147><s%> ouches <S%H4865><s%>, and put <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8799><s%> them on the shoulderpieces <S%H3802><s%> of the ephod <S%H646><s%>, before <S%H6440><s%> it <S%H4136><s%>.

And they made <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8799><s%> two <S%H8147><s%> rings <S%H2885><s%> of gold <S%H2091><s%>, and put <S%H7760><s%> <S%H8799><s%> them on the two <S%H8147><s%> ends <S%H7098><s%> of the breastplate <S%H2833><s%>, upon the border <S%H8193><s%> of it, which was on the side <S%H5676><s%> of the ephod <S%H646><s%> inward <S%H1004><s%>.

And they made <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8799><s%> two <S%H8147><s%> other golden <S%H2091><s%> rings <S%H2885><s%>, and put <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8799><s%> them on the two <S%H8147><s%> sides <S%H3802><s%> of the ephod <S%H646><s%> underneath <S%H4295><s%>, toward <S%H4136><s%> the forepart <S%H6440><s%> of it, over against <S%H5980><s%> the other coupling <S%H4225><s%> thereof, above <S%H4605><s%> the curious girdle <S%H2805><s%> of the ephod <S%H646><s%>.

And they did bind <S%H7405><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the breastplate <S%H2833><s%> by his rings <S%H2885><s%> unto the rings <S%H2885><s%> of the ephod <S%H646><s%> with a lace <S%H6616><s%> of blue <S%H8504><s%>, that it might be above the curious girdle <S%H2805><s%> of the ephod <S%H646><s%>, and that the breastplate <S%H2833><s%> might not be loosed <S%H2118><s%> <S%H8735><s%> from the ephod <S%H646><s%>; as the YY <S%H3068><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> <S%H8765><s%> Mosheh <S%H4872><s%>.
And he made <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the robe <S%H4598><s%> of the ephod <S%H646><s%> of woven <S%H707><s%> <S%H8802><s%> work <S%H4639><s%>, all <S%H3632><s%> of blue <S%H8504><s%>.

And there was an hole <S%H6310><s%> in the midst <S%H8432><s%> of the robe <S%H4598><s%>, as the hole <S%H6310><s%> of an habergeon <S%H8473><s%>, with a band <S%H8193><s%> round about <S%H5439><s%> the hole <S%H6310><s%>, that it should not rend <S%H7167><s%> <S%H8735><s%>.

And they made <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8799><s%> upon the hems <S%H7757><s%> of the robe <S%H4598><s%> pomegranates <S%H7416><s%> of blue <S%H8504><s%>, and purple <S%H713><s%>, and scarlet <S%H8144><s%> <S%H8438><s%>, and twined <S%H7806><s%> <S%H8716><s%> linen.

And they made <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8799><s%> bells <S%H6472><s%> of pure <S%H2889><s%> gold <S%H2091><s%>, and put <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the bells <S%H6472><s%> between <S%H8432><s%> the pomegranates <S%H7416><s%> upon the hem <S%H7757><s%> of the robe <S%H4598><s%>, round about <S%H5439><s%> between <S%H8432><s%> the pomegranates <S%H7416><s%>;

A bell <S%H6472><s%> and a pomegranate <S%H7416><s%>, a bell <S%H6472><s%> and a pomegranate <S%H7416><s%>, round about <S%H5439><s%> the hem <S%H7757><s%> of the robe <S%H4598><s%> to minister <S%H8334><s%> <S%H8763><s%> in; as the YY <S%H3068><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> <S%H8765><s%> Mosheh <S%H4872><s%>.

And they made <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8799><s%> coats <S%H3801><s%> of fine linen <S%H8336><s%> of woven <S%H707><s%> <S%H8802><s%> work <S%H4639><s%> for Aharon <S%H175><s%>, and for his sons <S%H1121><s%>,

And a mitre <S%H4701><s%> of fine linen <S%H8336><s%>, and goodly <S%H6287><s%> bonnets <S%H4021><s%> of fine linen <S%H8336><s%>, and linen <S%H906><s%> breeches <S%H4370><s%> of fine twined <S%H7806><s%> <S%H8716><s%> linen <S%H8336><s%>,

And a girdle <S%H73><s%> of fine twined <S%H7806><s%> <S%H8716><s%> linen <S%H8336><s%>, and blue <S%H8504><s%>, and purple <S%H713><s%>, and scarlet <S%H8144><s%> <S%H8438><s%>, of needlework <S%H7551><s%> <S%H8802><s%> <S%H4639><s%>; as the YY <S%H3068><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> <S%H8765><s%> Mosheh <S%H4872><s%>.

And they made <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the plate <S%H6731><s%> of the holy <S%H6944><s%> crown <S%H5145><s%> of pure <S%H2889><s%> gold <S%H2091><s%>, and wrote <S%H3789><s%> <S%H8799><s%> upon it a writing <S%H4385><s%>, like to the engravings <S%H6603><s%> of a signet <S%H2368><s%>, HOLINESS <S%H6944><s%> TO THE YY <S%H3068><s%>.

And they tied <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto it a lace <S%H6616><s%> of blue <S%H8504><s%>, to fasten <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8800><s%> it on high <S%H4605><s%> upon the mitre <S%H4701><s%>; as the YY <S%H3068><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> <S%H8765><s%> Mosheh <S%H4872><s%>.

Thus was all the work <S%H5656><s%> of the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%> of the tent <S%H168><s%> of the congregation <S%H4150><s%> finished <S%H3615><s%> <S%H8799><s%>: and the children <S%H1121><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> did <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8799><s%> according to all that the YY <S%H3068><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> <S%H8765><s%> Mosheh <S%H4872><s%>, so did <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8804><s%> they.

And they brought <S%H935><s%> <S%H8686><s%> the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%> unto Mosheh <S%H4872><s%>, the tent <S%H168><s%>, and all his furniture <S%H3627><s%>, his taches <S%H7165><s%>, his boards <S%H7175><s%>, his bars <S%H1280><s%>, and his pillars <S%H5982><s%>, and his sockets <S%H134><s%>,

And the covering <S%H4372><s%> of rams <S%H352><s%> ' skins <S%H5785><s%> dyed red <S%H119><s%> <S%H8794><s%>, and the covering <S%H4372><s%> of badgers <S%H8476><s%> ' skins <S%H5785><s%>, and the vail <S%H6532><s%> of the covering <S%H4539><s%>,
The ark <S%H727><s%> of the testimony <S%H5715><s%>, and the staves <S%H905><s%> thereof, and the mercy seat <S%H3727><s%>,
The table <S%H7979><s%>, and all the vessels <S%H3627><s%> thereof, and the shewbread <S%H6440><s%> <S%H3899><s%>,

The pure <S%H2889><s%> candlestick <S%H4501><s%>, with the Menorahs <S%H5216><s%> thereof, even with the Menorahs <S%H5216><s%> to be set in order <S%H4634><s%>, and all the vessels <S%H3627><s%> thereof, and the oil <S%H8081><s%> for light <S%H3974><s%>,

And the golden <S%H2091><s%> altar <S%H4196><s%>, and the anointing <S%H4888><s%> oil <S%H8081><s%>, and the sweet <S%H5561><s%> incense <S%H7004><s%>, and the hanging <S%H4539><s%> for the tabernacle <S%H168><s%> door <S%H6607><s%>,

The brasen <S%H5178><s%> altar <S%H4196><s%>, and his grate <S%H4345><s%> of brass <S%H5178><s%>, his staves <S%H905><s%>, and all his vessels <S%H3627><s%>, the laver <S%H3595><s%> and his foot <S%H3653><s%>,

The hangings <S%H7050><s%> of the court <S%H2691><s%>, his pillars <S%H5982><s%>, and his sockets <S%H134><s%>, and the hanging <S%H4539><s%> for the court <S%H2691><s%> gate <S%H8179><s%>, his cords <S%H4340><s%>, and his pins <S%H3489><s%>, and all the vessels <S%H3627><s%> of the service <S%H5656><s%> of the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%>, for the tent <S%H168><s%> of the congregation <S%H4150><s%>,

The cloths <S%H899><s%> of service <S%H8278><s%> to do service <S%H8334><s%> <S%H8763><s%> in the holy <S%H6944><s%> place, and the holy <S%H6944><s%> garments <S%H899><s%> for Aharon <S%H175><s%> the Kohen <S%H3548><s%>, and his sons <S%H1121><s%> ' garments <S%H899><s%>, to minister in the Kohen's office <S%H3547><s%> <S%H8763><s%>.

According to all that the YY <S%H3068><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> <S%H8765><s%> Mosheh <S%H4872><s%>, so the children <S%H1121><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> made <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8804><s%> all the work <S%H5656><s%>.

And Mosheh <S%H4872><s%> did look <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8799><s%> upon all <S%H3651><s%> the work <S%H4399><s%>, and, behold, they had done <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8804><s%> it as the YY <S%H3068><s%> had commanded <S%H6680><s%> <S%H8765><s%>, even so had they done <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8804><s%> it: and Mosheh <S%H4872><s%> blessed <S%H1288><s%> <S%H8762><s%> them.
